detectors.description:
Reentrancy in GAMERDevRewards.claimRewards() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GAMERDevRewards.sol#414-422):
	External calls:
	- gamer.mint(msg.sender,trueRewards) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GAMERDevRewards.sol#420)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardPaid(trueRewards) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GAMERDevRewards.sol#421)

detectors.description:
GAMERDevRewards.totalReleasedRewards() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GAMERDevRewards.sol#404-408) uses timestamp for comparisons

	- block.timestamp <= starttime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GAMERDevRewards.sol#405)
	- block.timestamp >= endtime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GAMERDevRewards.sol#406)
